message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $22,000.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $12,000 is too low, I'm willing to come down to $19,000.  I believe this product will exceed your expectations and be worth far more than that in the long run.
I'm still interested in the product, but $19,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $14,500. Would you be willing to sell it to me at that price?
